about.title: About us
about.blue: ScaleConf Colombia is a 2-day language-agnostic tech conference about scalability, distributed systems, security, machine learning, DevOps, modern software tools and practices.
about.first: Our main objective is to level up the community’s knowledge, by bringing great speakers from the teams that are paving the way for a global scale in tomorrow’s apps and services.
about.second: Our last event was successful beyond our expectations, with over 350 attendees, 19 awesome speakers, 14 sponsors and 2 days of exciting talks. Our next event is happening May 17 & 18, 2019!
